pkgmetadata.longdescription: Integrative Survival Modeling // Contains implementations of the integrative Cox model with uncertain event times proposed by Wang, et al. (2020) doi:10.1214/19-AOAS1287, the regularized Cox cure rate model with uncertain event status proposed by Wang, et al. (2023) doi:10.1007/s12561-023-09374-w, and other survival analysis routines including the Cox cure rate model proposed by Kuk and Chen (1992) doi:10.1093/biomet/79.3.531 via an EM algorithm proposed by Sy and Taylor (2000) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2000.00227.x, the regularized Cox cure rate model with elastic net penalty following Masud et al. (2018) doi:10.1177/0962280216677748.
